casebody.data:
Sadie J. CARTER and Helen C. Lytch
v.
ST. AUGUSTINE'S UNIVERSITY No. 456P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Charles T. Francis, Ruth A. Sheehan, Attorneys at Law, for St. Augustine's University. Nicholas J. Sanservino, Jr., Laura L. Noble, Attorneys at Law, for Carter, Sadie J., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 27th of December 2018 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
